info.name: Wikipedia 1911 - force dark table data
info.description:
Some elements on wikipedia have embedded style information in HTML.
This often makes them hard to read while using dark themes, but forcing them to be dark can result in lost information (for example: green and red table cells in some tables).
Use this style as a toggle for dark table cells.
This style is meant to be used with Wikipedia 1911 dark improved, but should work with any dark theme.
